input.sentences: it was a wet day as our group met up to go hiking .
we saw great sights | including a waterfall along the trail .
it was a long trail | but the path was well kept .
after the hike | we settled down for a lunch in the shade .
at the end of the day | we had coffee with our new friends .
output.sentences: Sometimes old people stand in the rain, waiting for things
A fine waterfall reminds the elderly of gravity.
Although the trail was gentle, gates made of popsicle sticks were used to corral the old people.
As the time for noon-day meal approached, the number of the group had dwindled sharply, wolves howled in the distance
The survivors met at Starbucks the following day to begin the healing process with the fabled pumpkin spice.
